Package org.jboss.soa.esb.common

Interface Summary
JBossESBPropertyServiceMBean This MBean wraps the configuration to allow ServiceBindingManager to alter the configuration.

Class Summary
Configuration  
Environment  
JBossESBPropertyService This MBean wraps the configuration to allow ServiceBindingManager to alter the configuration.
JBossESBTransactionService  
ModulePropertyManager The ESB configuration file is split into modules, each concerned with a specific capability.
TagNames Base class to hold commonly used tagnames.
TransactionStrategy This class represents the transaction strategy that is currently in force within the ESB.
TransactionStrategy.NullTransactionStrategy The null transaction strategy.
